unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: ${ \chi}^{2}$ Independence: How Much Freedom In Relationships?
question_text: A student wondered if there was an association between relationship status and overall letter grade(based off grade point average) at her high school.    She used a stratified random sample to select  20 students within each letter grade.  The information is displayed in the table below. Letter Grade In a relationship Not in a relationship Total A 8 12 20 B 11 9 20 C 13 7 20 D 10 10 20 F 6 14 20 Total 48 52 100 Which of the following is the number of degrees of freedom used for the appropriate test of significance?
